p: In general, antioxidant properties of polyphenolic compounds, such as some flavonoids, have been associated with the presence of aromatic phenolic rings that promote the electron donation and hydrogen atom transfer to free radicals, acting as free radical scavengers, reducing agents, and quenchers of single oxygen formation [ 45]. Thus, the aim of this study was to investigate the antioxidant capacity and antiviral activity of natural antioxidants against coronavirus. The compounds are illustrated in Figure 1.
